Title: Lawyers group defends Mele Kyari, calls EFCC probe smear campaign
Summary: Lawyers group defends Mele Kyari, calls EFCC probe smear campaign . Lawyers in Defence of Democracy strongly defended the immediate past Group Chief Executive Officer (GCEO) of the Nigerian National Petroleum Company Limited . The group describes the ongoing investigation by the EFCC as an ongoing investigation .

Title: Sudan crisis escalates as drone attack hits military airport
Summary: Sudan accuses Rapid Support Forces (RSF) of launching a series of drone attacks, including a strike early Sunday targeting the Osman Digna Air Base in Port Sudan . Describes the attack as a blatant insistence on insisting on the attack .

Title: Court sentences ex-convict, one other to jail for hawking Naira notes
Summary: Federal High Court sentences ex-convict, one other to jail for illegally hawking Naira notes . The two women were sentenced to one year in prison each . They were sentenced in violation of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) Act .

Title: Suspended vendor behind allegations against CNG initiative – P-CNGi
Summary: Presidential Compressed Natural Gas Initiative (P-CNGi) attributed allegations against its operations to a vendor suspended from its Conversion Incentive Program for unethical practices . In a statement issued in Abuja on Sunday, Kenechukwu Chukwu, Technical Assistant on the CNG initiative, said the allegations were made against a vendor

Title: Akinwumi Adesina’s claims on Nigeria’s GDP per capita: The facts tell a different story
Summary: A few days ago, outgoing AfDB President Akinwumi Adesina claimed that Nigerians today are worse off than in 1960 . According to Nairametrics, he claimed that Nigeria’s GDP per capita is higher than 1960s . The facts tell a different story .

Title: Man Utd have ‘big responsibility’ to win Europa League – Amorim
Summary: Ruben Amorim has warned his Manchester United players that they have a ‘big responsibility’ to win the Europa League . United warmed up for their Europa League semi-final second leg against Athletic Bilbao by suffering yet another Premier League defeat at Brentford on Sunday .

Title: 2027: I’ll still vote Peter Obi, says Farotimi
Summary: Farotimi says he hopes Obi will be bolder with his policy platforms . "I hope he will be a little bolder," he says . "There's nobody I will be supporting," he said .

Title: Over 1.5m candidates score less than 200 in 2025 UTME
Summary: Out of 1955069 candidates that sat for the 2025 Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME) Over 1.5 million candidates scored less than 200 in the exam .

Title: Three Africans among 16 cardinals tipped to succeed Pope Francis
Summary: Three Africans among 16 cardinals tipped to succeed Pope Francis . With no official campaigning or list of candidates, the election process is shrouded in secrecy .

Title: Trent Alexander-Arnold to leave Liverpool end of season
Summary: Trent Alexander-Arnold to leave Liverpool end of season . The 26-year-old posted on X.com that he will be leaving at the end of the season . "After 20 years at Liverpool Football Club, now is the time for me to confirm," he said .

Title: Oscar Piastri wins third F1 victory at Miami Grand Prix
Summary: Oscar Piastri clinched his third consecutive Formula 1 victory at the 2025 Miami Grand Prix, extending his lead in the World Championship standings . The 24-year-old Australian delivered a masterful performance, overtaking pole-sitter Max Verstappen on lap 14 and maintaining his lead to the finish line . He now leads

Title: Kaduna gov donates SUVs to monarchs, urges unity, peace
Summary: Kaduna State Governor, Uba Sani, has praised traditional leaders for their crucial role in maintaining peace and security in the state . Speaking at an event where 23 vehicles were distributed to traditional leaders, held at the Sir Kashim Ibrahim House, Kaduna, on Sunday . He said the success of the state’s non-

Title: VIDEO: Viral video shows police officers assaulting young man
Summary: A viral video making the rounds online has shown officers of the Nigeria Police Force assaulting an unidentified young man . The video, shared by X user Somto Okonkwo, shows the moment the victim is harassed and hit by uniformed personnel . The Police Complaint Response Unit (NPF-CRU) acknowledged the video and called

Title: Don’t sleep with phone under your pillow, tech expert warns
Summary: Technology advisor at TMB Tech, Akin Ibitoye, has issued a stern warning to Nigerians about the health and safety risks of sleeping with mobile devices under their pillows or beside their beds . He highlighted the dangers posed by mobile gadgets ranging from disrupted sleep patterns to potential explosions caused by overheating lithium-ion batteries .

Title: Trent Alexander-Arnold set to join Real Madrid after Liverpool exit - Report
Summary: Liverpool defender Trent Alexander-Arnold is set to join Real Madrid on a five-year contract . The deal is in place with a verbal agreement already reached, according to transfer expert Fabrizio Romano . The 26-year-old made the announcement following Liverpool’s successful campaign to secure a 20th Premier League title
